story: You find yourself in a dimly lit room within the gang stronghold, surrounded by old machinery and abandoned workstations. As you explore the space, you notice a series of pipes overhead that appear to be part of an older ventilation system.

actions.action: Attempt to climb up onto the catwalk
actions.good: You manage to ascend safely and find a cache of useful items within a nearby maintenance room. Your agility proves beneficial.
actions.bad: As you climb, a loose section of the catwalk gives way beneath your weight, causing you to fall and take damage. The service elevator remains out of reach.

actions.action: Try to activate the service elevator
actions.good: After some fiddling with controls, you manage to get the elevator operational. Inside, you find a hidden compartment containing valuable items. Your technical skills pay off.
actions.bad: You attempt to force the elevator's controls, but this triggers a safety mechanism that locks you out of the elevator and causes you to take damage. The catwalk remains an option.

actions.good: By examining the pipes more closely, you discover a hidden access panel leading to a network of narrow ducts. Within these, you find a stash of useful items. Your curiosity proves rewarding.
actions.bad: While exploring the ductwork, you become disoriented and take damage from loose debris. The catwalk and service elevator remain as options.
